short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play 3D Rolling Ball Game as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
3D Rolling Ball is a challenging 3D puzzle game where you have to guide a ball through a series of obstacles to reach the finish line. The game has over 90 levels, each with its own unique challenges. You can move the track to the right, left, up, and down to help the ball reach its destination.

How to Play

Use the mouse to move the track.
The ball will move according to the laws of physics.
Guide the ball through the obstacles to reach the finish line.
Features

Over 90 challenging levels
Simple controls
3D environment
Little particles
Tips

Take your time and plan your moves carefully.
Use the obstacles to your advantage.
Don't give up!

- Play others games on the top-left menu
